author: larryi
msg: In preparation for Japanese resource strings, allow a character set for
Some attributes and handling was added so locale and character set
used for directory listings can be configured.

author: larryi
msg: In preparation for Japanese resource strings, use a character set that
matches the default locale if different from ISO-8859-1.

author: larryi
msg: Update to use properties to provide configurable tests to deal with
behavioral differences among various web servers.

author: larryi
msg: Add some input fields and handling to set various properties for the
internal test.  This makes it possible to run the tests without error while
using Apache, IIS, and Netscape as external web servers.
Also, fix so that the selections are preserved across test runs.
